Definitely agree with you. I will spend money at least to just get 
that DVD. Fortunately though... I have the entire series when it 
first came out as fansubs. A friend of mine, who proudly calls 
himself an Otaku gave me not only his streamload collection but his 
hard disks. I'm certain I have this... I will let you guys know how 
it is! AHHHHH!!!!!!

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "spiritus_saitou" <spiritus_saitou@y...> 
wrote:
> Ah, but you underestimate some Saitou fans' obsessions.  ;-)  If I 
> had the money right now, I'd go after it.  Thanks for the 
> information... filing it away for the future.
> 
> phil (the obsessed)
>

for
